              "object_type": "Concept",

              "support": [
                {"quote": "exact substring", "char_span": [start,end]}
              ],
              "notes": "brief justification, including any pronoun/coref used"
            }

    Ontology concepts
    Building, Organisation, Tenant, Architecture, City, Person, Demonym, Place, Currency, ArchitecturalStyle, EthnicGroup, Country, Language, State
